DOC.brief_summary: The aim was to analyze the influence of fatigue on the dynamic postural control in one-leg standing and in jump landing, followed by stabilization or side jumps, and to compare athletes of different levels with control subjects.
DOC.criteria: competitive level (participation in any league) for the high performance athletes group participation in sport for 0.54 hours per week for the recreationally active subjects current history of a lower extremity injury requiring training cessation on the day of testing neurological diseases vestibular or visual disturbances cardiovascular diseases medication affecting balance
